document.full_text: catherine deneuve may be 67 years-old, which is past retirement age for many people. but the legendary french actress shows no sign of slowing down after making well over 100 films, including "potiche," which debuts in major u.s. cities on friday.
document.title: catherine deneuve; timid wife to tigress in "potiche"
lines_and_colors: catherine deneuve may be 67 years-old, which is past retirement age for many people. but the legendary french actress shows no sign of slowing down after making well over 100 films, including "potiche," which debuts in major u.s. cities on friday.
